summary.para: An asset to represent a table of localized strings for one specific locale.
Is this asset used to localize UI components of the Unity Editor
ISO Code used to identify the locale. ex: en-uk, zh-hans, ja
Creates a new empty LocalizationAsset object.
Get the localized string for the specified key.

returns.para: Localized string matching the original in the LocalizationAsset locale

member.name: M:UnityEngine.LocalizationAsset.SetLocalizedString(System.String,System.String)

summary.para: Set the localized string for the specified key

member.param: Localized string matching the original in the LocalizationAsset locale
